isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - PRESSURE LIMITING VALVE - MAINTENANCE

svcproc.title: MAINTENANCE
svcproc.para: Every 6 months or 50,000 miles (80,000 km), connect a test gauge to the delivery line and observe at what pressure the inlet valves close, which is the delivery pressure. If the pressure delivered by the pressure limiting valve varies more than plus or minus 5 psi from the pressure setting of the pressure limiting valve, the valve should be adjusted. The lock nut should be tightened after each adjustment and locking wire seal replaced if used. Every year or every 100,000 miles (160,000 km), perform Operating and Leakage Tests as follows.
